TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed Dns extends System.Object
public ref class Dns abstract sealed

summary.span: 提供简单的域名解析功能。

span.span: Provides simple domain name resolution functionality.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类是一个静态类，从 Internet 域名系统 (DNS) 中检索有关特定主机的信息。The class is a static class that retrieves information about a specific host from the Internet Domain Name System (DNS). DNS 查询中的主机信息返回的实例中类。The host information from the DNS query is returned in an instance of the class. 如果指定的主机在 DNS 数据库中，有多个条目包含多个 IP 地址和别名。If the specified host has more than one entry in the DNS database, contains multiple IP addresses and aliases. ## Examples 下面的示例查询 DNS 数据库中的主机 www.contoso.com 上的信息。The following example queries the DNS database for information on the host www.contoso.com. [!code-cpp[Classic Dns Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic Dns Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Dns Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic Dns Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Dns Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic Dns Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

public: static IAsyncResult ^ BeginGetHostAddresses(System::String ^ hostNameOrAddress, AsyncCallback ^ requestCallback, System::Object ^ state);
static member BeginGetHostAddresses : string * AsyncCallback * obj -> IAsyncResult

param.name: hostNameOrAddress
param.span: 要解析的主机名或 IP 地址。

span.span: The host name or IP address to resolve.

param.name: requestCallback
param.span: 一个 委托，它引用操作完成时要调用的方法。

span.span: An delegate that references the method to invoke when the operation is complete.

param.name: state
param.span: 一个用户定义对象，其中包含操作的相关信息。

span.span: A user-defined object that contains information about the operation.

param.span: 操作完成后，此对象会被传递给 requestCallback 委托。

span.span: This object is passed to the requestCallback delegate when the operation is complete.

summary.span: 异步返回指定主机的 Internet 协议 (IP) 地址。

span.span: Asynchronously returns the Internet Protocol (IP) addresses for the specified host.

returns.span: 引用异步请求的 实例。

span.span: An instance that references the asynchronous request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法以异步方式将查询与主机名相关联的 IP 地址的 DNS 服务器。The method asynchronously queries a DNS server for the IP addresses that are associated with a host name. 如果`hostNameOrAddress`是 IP 地址，而无需查询 DNS 服务器返回此地址。If `hostNameOrAddress` is an IP address, this address is returned without querying the DNS server. > [!NOTE] > 在应用程序中启用网络跟踪时，此成员会发出跟踪信息。This member emits trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在.NET Framework 中进行网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). 如果为空字符串作为传递`hostNameOrAddress`参数，则此方法返回本地主机的 IPv4 和 IPv6 地址。If an empty string is passed as the `hostNameOrAddress` argument, then this method returns the IPv4 and IPv6 addresses of the local host. 异步完成操作，必须通过调用方法。The asynchronous operation must be completed by calling the method. 通常情况下，通过调用该方法`requestCallback`委托。Typically, the method is invoked by the `requestCallback` delegate. 此方法不会阻止，直到完成该操作。This method does not block until the operation is complete. 若要阻止，直到完成该操作后，使用方法。To block until the operation is complete, use the method. 有关使用异步编程模型的详细信息，请参阅[异步调用同步方法](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md)For more information about using the asynchronous programming model, see [Calling Synchronous Methods Asynchronously](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md)

remarks.format: ## Remarks 异步完成操作，必须通过调用方法。The asynchronous operation must be completed by calling the method. 通常情况下，通过调用该方法`requestCallback`委托。Typically, the method is invoked by the `requestCallback` delegate. 此方法不会阻止，直到完成该操作。This method does not block until the operation is complete. 若要阻止，直到完成该操作后，使用方法。To block until the operation is complete, use the method. 有关使用异步编程模型的详细信息，请参阅[Calling Synchronous Methods Asynchronously](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md)。For detailed information about using the asynchronous programming model, see [Calling Synchronous Methods Asynchronously](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md). > [!NOTE] > 在应用程序中启用网络跟踪时，此成员会发出跟踪信息。This member emits trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在.NET Framework 中进行网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法以异步方式将查询的 IP 地址和 IP 地址与关联的别名的 DNS 服务器。The method asynchronously queries a DNS server for the IP addresses and aliases associated with an IP address. **请注意**时在应用程序中启用网络跟踪，此成员发出跟踪信息。**Note** This member emits trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在.NET Framework 中进行网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). 异步完成操作，必须通过调用方法。The asynchronous operation must be completed by calling the method. 通常情况下，通过调用该方法`requestCallback`委托。Typically, the method is invoked by the `requestCallback` delegate. 此方法不会阻止，直到完成该操作。This method does not block until the operation is complete. 若要阻止，直到完成该操作后，使用方法。To block until the operation is complete, use the method. 有关使用异步编程模型的详细信息，请参阅[异步调用同步方法](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md)For detailed information about using the asynchronous programming model, see [Calling Synchronous Methods Asynchronously](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md) ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用方法以解析 IP 地址为实例。The following code example uses the method to resolve an IP address to an instance. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将查询与主机名相关联的 IP 地址或 IP 地址的 DNS 服务器。The method queries a DNS server for the IP address that is associated with a host name or IP address. **请注意**时在应用程序中启用网络跟踪，此成员发出跟踪信息。**Note** This member emits trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在.NET Framework 中进行网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). 异步完成操作，必须通过调用方法。The asynchronous operation must be completed by calling the method. 通常情况下，通过调用该方法`requestCallback`委托。Typically, the method is invoked by the `requestCallback` delegate. 此方法不会阻止，直到完成该操作。This method does not block until the operation is complete. 若要阻止，直到完成该操作后，使用方法。To block until the operation is complete, use the method. 有关使用异步编程模型的详细信息，请参阅[Calling Synchronous Methods Asynchronously](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md)。For detailed information about using the asynchronous programming model, see [Calling Synchronous Methods Asynchronously](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用方法以解析 IP 地址为实例。The following code example uses the method to resolve an IP address to an instance. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将查询与主机名关联的 IP 地址的 DNS 服务器。The method queries a DNS server for the IP addresses associated with a host name. 如果`hostNameOrAddress`是 IP 地址，而无需查询 DNS 服务器返回此地址。If `hostNameOrAddress` is an IP address, this address is returned without querying the DNS server. 如果为空字符串作为传递`hostNameOrAddress`参数，则此方法返回本地主机的 IPv4 和 IPv6 地址。If an empty string is passed as the `hostNameOrAddress` argument, then this method returns the IPv4 and IPv6 addresses of the local host. > [!NOTE] > 在应用程序中启用网络跟踪时，此成员会发出跟踪信息。This member emits trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在.NET Framework 中进行网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将阻塞，直到操作完成。This method blocks until the operation is complete. 若要以同步方式执行此操作，请使用方法。To perform this operation synchronously, use the method. 如果属性设置为`true`，则属性的返回实例不由该方法填充并始终为空。If the property is set to `true`, the property of the instance returned is not populated by this method and will always be empty. > [!NOTE] > 在应用程序中启用网络跟踪时，此成员会发出跟踪信息。This member emits trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在.NET Framework 中进行网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).

span.span: An object that contains DNS information about a host.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将阻塞，直到操作完成。This method blocks until the operation is complete. 如果设置为`true`，则属性的返回实例不由该方法填充并始终为空。If the is set to `true`, the property of the instance returned is not populated by this method and will always be empty. 若要以同步方式执行此操作，请使用方法。To perform this operation synchronously, use the method. > [!NOTE] > 在应用程序中启用网络跟踪时，此成员会发出跟踪信息。This member emits trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在.NET Framework 中进行网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下面的示例结束对 DNS 主机信息的异步请求。The following example ends an asynchronous request for DNS host information. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将查询与主机名关联的 IP 地址的 DNS 服务器。The method queries a DNS server for the IP addresses associated with a host name. 如果`hostNameOrAddress`是 IP 地址，而无需查询 DNS 服务器返回此地址。If `hostNameOrAddress` is an IP address, this address is returned without querying the DNS server. 如果为空字符串作为传递`hostNameOrAddress`参数，则此方法返回本地主机的 IPv4 和 IPv6 地址。If an empty string is passed as the `hostNameOrAddress` argument, then this method returns the IPv4 and IPv6 addresses of the local host. IPv6 地址进行筛选的结果中的方法如果本地计算机没有安装 IPv6。IPv6 addresses are filtered from the results of the method if the local computer does not have IPv6 installed. 因此，很可能返回一个空只要 IPv6 结果可用于`hostNameOrAddress`.parameter。As a result, it is possible to get back an empty instance if only IPv6 results where available for the `hostNameOrAddress`.parameter. > [!NOTE] > 在应用程序中启用网络跟踪时，此成员会发出跟踪信息。This member emits trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在.NET Framework 中进行网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用方法以将 IP 地址解析为类型的数组。The following code example uses the method to resolve an IP address to an array of type . remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法查询主机信息的 Internet DNS 服务器。The method queries the Internet DNS server for host information. 如果主机名称传递了空字符串，此方法检索本地计算机的标准主机名。If you pass an empty string as the host name, this method retrieves the standard host name for the local computer. 对于异步访问的 DNS 信息，请使用和方法。For asynchronous access to DNS information, use the and methods. 如果属性设置为`true`，则属性的返回实例不由该方法填充并始终为空。If the property is set to `true`, the property of the instance returned is not populated by this method and will always be empty. > [!NOTE] > 在应用程序中启用网络跟踪时，此成员会发出跟踪信息。This member emits trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在.NET Framework 中进行网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下面的示例使用方法以获取指定的 DNS 主机名的 DNS 信息。The following example uses the method to get the DNS information for the specified DNS host name. [!code-cpp[Dns_GetHostByName#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Dns_GetHostByName/CPP/dns_gethostbyname.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Dns_GetHostByName#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Dns_GetHostByName/CS/dns_gethostbyname.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Dns_GetHostByName#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Dns_GetHostByName/VB/dns_gethostbyname.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将查询的 IP 地址和 IP 地址与关联的别名的 DNS 服务器。The method queries a DNS server for the IP addresses and aliases associated with an IP address. IPv6 地址进行筛选的结果中的方法如果本地计算机没有安装 IPv6。IPv6 addresses are filtered from the results of the method if the local computer does not have IPv6 installed. 因此，很可能返回一个空只要 IPv6 结果可用于`address`参数。As a result, it is possible to get back an empty instance if only IPv6 results where available for the `address` parameter. 属性的返回实例不由该方法填充并始终为空。The property of the instance returned is not populated by this method and will always be empty. > [!NOTE] > 在应用程序中启用网络跟踪时，此成员会发出跟踪信息。This member emits trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在.NET Framework 中进行网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用方法以解析 IP 地址为实例。The following code example uses the method to resolve an IP address to an instance. [!code-cpp[System.Net.Dns#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Dns/CPP/dnsnewmethods.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[System.Net.Dns#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Dns/CS/dnsnewmethods.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Net.Dns#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Dns/vb/dnsnewmethods.vb#4)]

param.name: hostNameOrAddress
param.span: 要解析的主机名或 IP 地址。

span.span: The host name or IP address to resolve.

summary.span: 将主机名或 IP 地址解析为 实例。

span.span: Resolves a host name or IP address to an instance.

returns.span: 一个 实例，包含有关 中指定的主机的地址信息。

span.span: An instance that contains address information about the host specified in .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将查询与主机名相关联的 IP 地址或 IP 地址的 DNS 服务器。The method queries a DNS server for the IP address that is associated with a host name or IP address. 如果为空字符串作为传递`hostNameOrAddress`参数，则此方法返回本地主机的 IPv4 和 IPv6 地址。If an empty string is passed as the `hostNameOrAddress` argument, then this method returns the IPv4 and IPv6 addresses of the local host. 如果找不到的主机名，异常返回的值为 11001 （Windows 套接字错误 WSAHOST_NOT_FOUND）。If the host name could not be found, the exception is returned with a value of 11001 (Windows Sockets error WSAHOST_NOT_FOUND). 如果 DNS 服务器没有响应，则可以返回此异常。This exception can be returned if the DNS server does not respond. 如果名称不是正式的主机名或别名，或找不到它在查询的数据库中，也会返回此异常。This exception can also be returned if the name is not an official host name or alias, or it cannot be found in the database(s) being queried. 异常也会返回，如果`hostNameOrAddress`参数包含或。The exception is also returned if the `hostNameOrAddress` parameter contains or . 方法假定，如果 IP 文本字符串中传递`hostNameOrAddress`参数，该应用程序希望参数返回的属性集的所有实例。The method assumes that if an IP literal string is passed in the `hostNameOrAddress` parameter that the application wants an instance returned with all of the properties set. 这些属性包括， ，和。These properties include the , , and . 因此，实现方法时传递 IP 字符串表现为以下行为：As a result, the implementation of the method exhibits the following behavior when an IP string literal is passed: 1. 方法尝试解析地址。The method tries to parse the address. 如果`hostNameOrAddress`参数包含合法 IP 字符串文字，则第一阶段成功。If the `hostNameOrAddress` parameter contains a legal IP string literal, then the first phase succeeds. 2. 使用 IP 字符串文字的 IP 地址的反向查找试图获取的主机名。A reverse lookup using the IP address of the IP string literal is attempted to obtain the host name. 此结果集作为属性。This result is set as the property. 3. 再次使用这种反向查找来自的主机名来获取所有可能的 IP 地址与名称相关联并将设置为属性。The host name from this reverse lookup is used again to obtain all the possible IP addresses associated with the name and set as the property. 对于 IPv4 字符串文字，上述所有三个步骤可能会成功。For an IPv4 string literal, all three steps above may succeed. 但很可能实际上属于要返回的不同主机的 IPv4 地址的过时 DNS 记录。But it is possible for a stale DNS record for an IPv4 address that actually belongs to a different host to be returned. 这可能会导致步骤 #3 失败并引发的异常 （不存在 DNS PTR 记录的 IPv4 地址，但没有 DNS A 记录的 IPv4 地址）。This may cause step #3 to fail and throw an exception (there is a DNS PTR record for the IPv4 address, but no DNS A record for the IPv4 address). 对于 IPv6，上面的步骤 #2 可能会失败，因为大多数 IPv6 部署并注册 IPv6 地址的反向 (PTR) 记录。For IPv6, step #2 above may fail, since most IPv6 deployments do not register the reverse (PTR) record for an IPv6 address. 因此，此方法可能会返回字符串 IPv6 文字中的完全限定域名 (FQDN) 主机名称属性。So this method may return the string IPv6 literal as the fully-qualified domain (FQDN) host name in the property. 方法具有与 IP 文本有关的不同行为。The method has different behavior with respect to IP literals. 如果上面的步骤 1 成功 （它成功地分析为 IP 地址），因此立即返回地址。If step #1 above succeeds (it successfully parses as an IP address), that address is immediately returned as the result. 不会尝试在反向查找。There is no attempt at a reverse lookup. IPv6 地址进行筛选的结果中的方法如果本地计算机没有安装 IPv6。IPv6 addresses are filtered from the results of the method if the local computer does not have IPv6 installed. 因此，很可能返回一个空只要 IPv6 结果可用于`hostNameOrAddress`.parameter。As a result, it is possible to get back an empty instance if only IPv6 results where available for the `hostNameOrAddress`.parameter. 属性的返回实例不由该方法填充并始终为空。The property of the instance returned is not populated by this method and will always be empty. > [!NOTE] > 在应用程序中启用网络跟踪时，此成员会发出跟踪信息。This member emits trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在.NET Framework 中进行网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下面的示例使用方法以解析 IP 地址为实例。The following example uses the method to resolve an IP address to an instance. [!code-cpp[System.Net.Dns#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Dns/CPP/dnsnewmethods.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Net.Dns#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Dns/CS/dnsnewmethods.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Net.Dns#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Dns/vb/dnsnewmethods.vb#1)]

span.span: The property on the task object returns an instance that contains address information about the host specified in .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不会阻止此操作。This operation will not block. 返回对象将完成后`address`已解决。The returned object will complete after the `address` has been resolved. 此方法将查询的 IP 地址和 IP 地址与关联的别名的 DNS 服务器。This method queries a DNS server for the IP addresses and aliases associated with an IP address. 如果本地计算机没有安装 IPv6，IPv6 地址进行筛选的结果中的此方法。IPv6 addresses are filtered from the results of this method if the local computer does not have IPv6 installed. 因此，很可能返回一个空只要 IPv6 结果可用于`address`参数。As a result, it is possible to get back an empty instance if only IPv6 results where available for the `address` parameter. 属性的返回实例不由该方法填充并始终为空。The property of the instance returned is not populated by this method and will always be empty. > [!NOTE] > 在应用程序中启用网络跟踪时，此成员会发出跟踪信息。This member emits trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在.NET Framework 中进行网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).

span.span: is .
An error is encountered when resolving .

exception.span: 是无效的 IP 地址。

span.span: is an invalid IP address.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Threading.Tasks.Task<System.Net.IPHostEntry> GetHostEntryAsync (string hostNameOrAddress);
.method public static hidebysig class System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1<class System.Net.IPHostEntry> GetHostEntryAsync(string hostNameOrAddress) cil managed
Public Shared Function GetHostEntryAsync (hostNameOrAddress As String) As Task(Of IPHostEntry)
public: static System::Threading::Tasks::Task<System::Net::IPHostEntry ^> ^ GetHostEntryAsync(System::String ^ hostNameOrAddress);
static member GetHostEntryAsync : string -> System.Threading.Tasks.Task<System.Net.IPHostEntry>

param.name: hostNameOrAddress
param.span: 要解析的主机名或 IP 地址。

span.span: The host name or IP address to resolve.

summary.span: 将主机名或 IP 地址解析为 实例以作为异步操作。

span.span: Resolves a host name or IP address to an instance as an asynchronous operation.

returns.span: 返回 。

span.span: Returns .

returns.span: 表示异步操作的任务对象。

span.span: The task object representing the asynchronous operation.

returns.span: 任务对象上的 属性返回 实例，该实例包含有关 中指定的主机的地址信息。

span.span: The property on the task object returns an instance that contains address information about the host specified in .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不会阻止此操作。This operation will not block. 返回对象将完成后`hostNameOrAddress`已解决。The returned object will complete after the `hostNameOrAddress` has been resolved. 此方法将查询与主机名相关联的 IP 地址或 IP 地址的 DNS 服务器。This method queries a DNS server for the IP address that is associated with a host name or IP address. 如果为空字符串作为传递`hostNameOrAddress`参数，则此方法返回本地主机的 IPv4 和 IPv6 地址。If an empty string is passed as the `hostNameOrAddress` argument, then this method returns the IPv4 and IPv6 addresses of the local host. 如果找不到的主机名，异常返回的值为 11001 （Windows 套接字错误 WSAHOST_NOT_FOUND）。If the host name could not be found, the exception is returned with a value of 11001 (Windows Sockets error WSAHOST_NOT_FOUND). 如果 DNS 服务器没有响应，则可以返回此异常。This exception can be returned if the DNS server does not respond. 如果名称不是正式的主机名或别名，或找不到它在查询的数据库中，也会返回此异常。This exception can also be returned if the name is not an official host name or alias, or it cannot be found in the database(s) being queried. 异常也会返回，如果`hostNameOrAddress`参数包含或。The exception is also returned if the `hostNameOrAddress` parameter contains or . 此方法假设，如果 IP 文本字符串中传递`hostNameOrAddress`参数，该应用程序希望参数返回的属性集的所有实例。This method assumes that if an IP literal string is passed in the `hostNameOrAddress` parameter that the application wants an instance returned with all of the properties set. 这些属性包括， ，和。These properties include the , , and . 因此，此方法的实现表现为以下行为时传递 IP 字符串：As a result, the implementation of this method exhibits the following behavior when an IP string literal is passed: 1. 方法尝试解析地址。The method tries to parse the address. 如果`hostNameOrAddress`参数包含合法 IP 字符串文字，则第一阶段成功。If the `hostNameOrAddress` parameter contains a legal IP string literal, then the first phase succeeds. 2. 使用 IP 字符串文字的 IP 地址的反向查找试图获取的主机名。A reverse lookup using the IP address of the IP string literal is attempted to obtain the host name. 此结果集作为属性。This result is set as the property. 3. 再次使用这种反向查找来自的主机名来获取所有可能的 IP 地址与名称相关联并将设置为属性。The host name from this reverse lookup is used again to obtain all the possible IP addresses associated with the name and set as the property. 对于 IPv4 字符串文字，上述所有三个步骤可能会成功。For an IPv4 string literal, all three steps above may succeed. 但很可能实际上属于要返回的不同主机的 IPv4 地址的过时 DNS 记录。But it is possible for a stale DNS record for an IPv4 address that actually belongs to a different host to be returned. 这可能会导致步骤 #3 失败并引发的异常 （不存在 DNS PTR 记录的 IPv4 地址，但没有 DNS A 记录的 IPv4 地址）。This may cause step #3 to fail and throw an exception (there is a DNS PTR record for the IPv4 address, but no DNS A record for the IPv4 address). 对于 IPv6，上面的步骤 #2 可能会失败，因为大多数 IPv6 部署并注册 IPv6 地址的反向 (PTR) 记录。For IPv6, step #2 above may fail, since most IPv6 deployments do not register the reverse (PTR) record for an IPv6 address. 因此，此方法可能会返回字符串 IPv6 文字中的完全限定域名 (FQDN) 主机名称属性。So this method may return the string IPv6 literal as the fully-qualified domain (FQDN) host name in the property. 方法具有与 IP 文本有关的不同行为。The method has different behavior with respect to IP literals. 如果上面的步骤 1 成功 （它成功地分析为 IP 地址），因此立即返回地址。If step #1 above succeeds (it successfully parses as an IP address), that address is immediately returned as the result. 不会尝试在反向查找。There is no attempt at a reverse lookup. 如果本地计算机没有安装 IPv6，IPv6 地址进行筛选的结果中的此方法。IPv6 addresses are filtered from the results of this method if the local computer does not have IPv6 installed. 因此，很可能返回一个空只要 IPv6 结果可用于`hostNameOrAddress`.parameter。As a result, it is possible to get back an empty instance if only IPv6 results where available for the `hostNameOrAddress`.parameter. 属性的返回实例不由该方法填充并始终为空。The property of the instance returned is not populated by this method and will always be empty. > [!NOTE] > 在应用程序中启用网络跟踪时，此成员会发出跟踪信息。This member emits trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在.NET Framework 中进行网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Net.IPHostEntry Resolve (string hostName);
.method public static hidebysig class System.Net.IPHostEntry Resolve(string hostName) cil managed
Public Shared Function Resolve (hostName As String) As IPHostEntry
public: static System::Net::IPHostEntry ^ Resolve(System::String ^ hostName);
static member Resolve : string -> System.Net.IPHostEntry

param.name: hostName
param.span: DNS 样式的主机名或 IP 地址。

span.span: A DNS-style host name or IP address.

summary.span: 将 DNS 主机名或 IP 地址解析为 实例。

span.span: Resolves a DNS host name or IP address to an instance.

returns.span: 一个 实例，包含有关 中指定的主机的地址信息。

span.span: An instance that contains address information about the host specified in .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将查询与主机名或 IP 地址关联的 IP 地址的 DNS 服务器。The method queries a DNS server for the IP address associated with a host name or IP address. 当`hostName`DNS 样式主机名相关联的多个 IP 地址返回仅为第一个 IP 地址解析为相应主机名。When `hostName` is a DNS-style host name associated with multiple IP addresses, only the first IP address that resolves to that host name is returned. 如果属性设置为`true`，则属性的返回实例不由该方法填充并始终为空。If the property is set to `true`, the property of the instance returned is not populated by this method and will always be empty. > [!NOTE] > 在应用程序中启用网络跟踪时，此成员会发出跟踪信息。This member emits trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在.NET Framework 中进行网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下面的示例使用方法以解析 IP 地址为实例。The following example uses the method to resolve an IP address to an instance. [!code-cpp[Dns_Resolve#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Dns_Resolve/CPP/dns_resolve.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Dns_Resolve#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Dns_Resolve/CS/dns_resolve.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Dns_Resolve#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Dns_Resolve/VB/dns_resolve.vb#1)]
